name: GPU Virtualization using vCuda
short_description: System level virtualization technology is spawned from the continued growth in hardware performance and increased demand for high performance computing in various arenas.VMM technology has been applied to many areas including intrusion detection, high performance computing and device driver reuse.Here we have to develop a vCUDA (Virtual CUDA) framework for High Performance Computing on GPUs.This uses hardware acceleration provided by GPUs to address the performance issues associated with VMs.
summary: A framework to virtualize the GPU utilizing NVIDIA's CUDA Library.
